name: Barbell Bench Press
description: Classic chest exercise performed lying on a bench, pressing a barbell from chest to full arm extension

name: Squat
description: Fundamental lower body exercise, lowering body by bending knees and hips, then standing back up

name: Deadlift
description: Hip-hinge movement lifting a barbell from the ground to standing position

name: Overhead Press
description: Pressing a barbell or dumbbells from shoulder level to overhead

name: Barbell Row
description: Pulling a barbell from a bent-over position to the lower chest/upper abdomen

name: Pull-ups
description: Bodyweight exercise hanging from a bar and pulling body up until chin clears the bar

name: Dips
description: Bodyweight exercise performed on parallel bars, lowering and raising body

name: Incline Bench Press
description: Bench press performed on an inclined bench (30-45 degrees)

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: Hip-hinge movement focusing on hamstring and glute stretch

name: Front Squat
description: Squat performed with barbell held in front of shoulders

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: Single-leg squat with rear foot elevated on a bench

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Bench press performed with dumbbells instead of barbell

name: Dumbbell Row
description: Single-arm rowing movement with dumbbell

name: Lateral Raises
description: Raising dumbbells to the sides to shoulder height

name: Face Pulls
description: Cable exercise pulling rope to face level, focusing on rear delts

name: Bicep Curls
description: Curl dumbbells or barbell to work biceps

name: Tricep Dips
description: Dips performed with emphasis on triceps

name: Plank
description: Isometric core exercise holding body in straight line

name: Push-ups
description: Bodyweight chest exercise performed in prone position

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Dynamic core exercise alternating leg positions in plank

name: Burpees
description: Full-body exercise combining squat, push-up, and jump

name: Kettlebell Swings
description: Hip-hinge movement swinging kettlebell from between legs to chest level

name: Goblet Squat
description: Squat performed holding a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest level

name: Walking Lunges
description: Alternating lunges while moving forward

name: Hip Thrusts
description: Glute-focused exercise performed with upper back against bench

name: Cable Pull-downs
description: Lat-focused pulling exercise using cable machine

name: Cable Chest Fly
description: Chest isolation exercise using cable machine

name: Leg Press
description: Machine-based leg exercise pressing weight away from body

name: Leg Curls
description: Hamstring isolation exercise using machine

name: Leg Extensions
description: Quadriceps isolation exercise using machine

name: Calf Raises
description: Calf exercise raising heels off ground

name: Shoulder Press
description: Overhead pressing movement with dumbbells or barbell

name: Arnold Press
description: Rotating shoulder press movement with dumbbells

name: Upright Rows
description: Pulling barbell or dumbbells up to chest level

name: Reverse Flyes
description: Rear delt isolation exercise with dumbbells

name: Hammer Curls
description: Bicep exercise with neutral grip using dumbbells

name: Preacher Curls
description: Bicep isolation exercise using preacher bench

name: Tricep Pushdowns
description: Tricep isolation exercise using cable machine

name: Skull Crushers
description: Tricep exercise lowering weight behind head while lying

name: Russian Twists
description: Core exercise rotating torso side to side while seated

name: Dead Bug
description: Core stability exercise lying on back, alternating arm and leg

name: Bird Dog
description: Core stability exercise on hands and knees, extending opposite arm and leg

name: Side Plank
description: Isometric core exercise holding body in side position

name: Hollow Body Hold
description: Core isometric exercise holding hollow position

name: Farmer Walks
description: Carrying heavy weights while walking

name: Turkish Get-ups
description: Complex movement from lying to standing while holding weight overhead

name: Battle Ropes
description: High-intensity cardio exercise with heavy ropes

name: Box Jumps
description: Explosive jumping exercise onto a box or platform

name: Jumping Jacks
description: Basic cardio exercise jumping while spreading arms and legs

name: High Knees
description: Running in place while bringing knees up high

name: Jumping Squats
description: Explosive squat variation with jump at the top
